questions.question: 4. Raghav was making a modulus 4 bit asynchronous counter instead of connecting clk of flip flop 2 with Q of flip flop 1 he connects it with Q` what will be observe

answers.a: It acts as modulus 16 bit asynchronous up counter
answers.b: It acts as modulus 4 bit asynchronous up counter
answers.c: It acts as modulus 16 bit asynchronous down counter
answers.d: It acts as modulus 4 bit asynchronous down counter
